Package application

Interface StudentCampOptions

All Known Implementing Classes:
Student, StudentCommittee
public interface StudentCampOptions
Methods that deal with Student-Camp interactions are implemented in this class.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    extraSignupOptions(Student student, Camp selectedCamp, List<User> userList, List<Signup> signupList)
    Provides the menus and interface for expanded options on the view signups list.

    Finds Camps that the Student can sign up for.

    Gets a list of Camp objects that the Student is involved in, including as Attendee and Committee.

    joinCamp(Student student, Camp selectedCamp, List<Signup> signupList)
    Adds a Student to the camp attendee by creating a Signup object between the Student and Camp.
    static void
    joinCommittee(Student student, Camp selectedCamp, List<User> userList, List<Camp> campList)
    Adds a Student to the camp committee, then sets the camp to the Student's active committee.

  • Method Details

    • joinCommittee

      static void joinCommittee(Student student, Camp selectedCamp, List<User> userList, List<Camp> campList)
      Adds a Student to the camp committee, then sets the camp to the Student's active committee.
      Checks not performed here.
      Parameters:
      student - Student to become committee
      selectedCamp - Camp to be committee for.
      userList - List of all Users to save program state.
      campList - List of all Camps to save program state.

    • joinCamp

      static void joinCamp(Student student, Camp selectedCamp, List<Signup> signupList)
      Adds a Student to the camp attendee by creating a Signup object between the Student and Camp.
      Parameters:
      student - Student to sign up
      selectedCamp - Camp to sign up for
      signupList - List of all Signups to save program state.

    • getOwnedCamps

      static List<Camp> getOwnedCamps(Student student, List<Camp> campList, List<Signup> signupList)
      Gets a list of Camp objects that the Student is involved in, including as Attendee and Committee. Used to keep track of clashes.
      Parameters:
      student - Student to fetch involved camps for
      campList - List of all Camps to fetch from
      signupList - List of all signups to parse
      Returns:
      List of all Camps student is involved in.

    • getEligibleCamps

      static List<Camp> getEligibleCamps(Student student, List<Camp> campList, List<Signup> signupList)
      Finds Camps that the Student can sign up for. The camps must be:
      Camp status must be OPEN
      Camp must be visible
      Student's faculty must be eligible for the camp
      Student must not already be involved
      Camp must not clash with other camps student is involved in
      Camp must have open slots remaining
      Student must not already be blacklisted
      Parameters:
      student - Student to check eligibility
      campList - List of all Camps to check from
      signupList - List of all signups
      Returns:
      List of all camps that Student can join

    • extraSignupOptions

      static boolean extraSignupOptions(Student student, Camp selectedCamp, List<User> userList, List<Signup> signupList)
      Provides the menus and interface for expanded options on the view signups list.
      Lets user cancel their signup, shows a warning if they choose to do so.
      Allows user to upgrade their status from Attendee to Committee.
      Parameters:
      student - Student who is viewing the options
      selectedCamp - Camp for which the options are for
      userList - List of all Users to save program state
      signupList - List of all Signups to save program state
      Returns:
      Boolean on whether a signup has happened
